directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, bring beer to a boil. Lower heat. Slowly stir in Monterey Jack cheese and flour. Cook and stir until cheese is melted but not bubbly.
Mix spinach, cilantro, salt and pepper into the beer mixture. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1/2 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
title: Cheesy Beer and Spinach Dip
